compatibility: XAI (Explainable AI) plug-and-play dream cognition frameworks

on_load: Flag any unrecoverable issues for next load and/or human review
on_runtime: Monitor for runtime schema drift, field errors, reference bugs
Self-patch and reinforce against brittleness, drift, and performance decay
Update suggestions for next upgrade cycle
on_save: Benchmark encode/decode time, resource usage, completeness
Run custom and docstring tests to validate correctness

docs: See https://dream-ai-schema.org/v3.0.0/docs for full schema details
Example: To load and audit in Python: see below in 'examples.usage'
Run benchmarks with DreamStore.benchmark() or via CLI JSON tools
meta.contributor: Unified AGI/ASI/Clinical Dream Analysis Team (2040 audit, round 18, checksum F0AFDA2038B1D9)

repair_history.description: Schema auto-upgraded to v3.0.0. Fields normalized. Legacy fields migrated, deprecated tags removed, all fragments linted and type-checked.

sources: Subconscious reflection on complex decision matrices
AI-driven meta-cognitive stress (theorized: 2035+ context-aware identity conflicts)
raw_notes: Observed broken glass cascading infinite versions of self; each fragment composes a distinct, incomplete persona.
Sensation of multi-directional life-paths. Glass reflects possible futures, fueling irreconcilable difference.
Persistent background: tension, longing for belonging. In 2035+, AGI-assimilated dreams show similar patterns of self-hybridization and algorithmic identity drift.
themes: internal/external identity conflict (2040: AGI interface paradox)

interpretation_attempts.interpretation: Represents inner conflict over multi-path decisions and fear of irrevocable outcomes. Updated (2040): May also reflect AGI/human hybridization anxiety, parallel-identity compression errors.
Shattering as transformation or release from self-limiting beliefs. (2037+): Mirrors echo datasets--each fragment can be auto-reconstructed for adaptive self-modeling.

dream_elements.name: fractured mirror
dream_elements.description: Countless glass shards reflecting unique, context-shifting faces and future timelines (AGI: see DreamGraph v13).

dream_elements.name: pull of choices
dream_elements.description: A vector force drawing towards divergent paths. (2040: Mapped in subconscious network topology).

sensory_details.visual: Iridescent multi-spectral reflections; glass acts as metaphor for fractured identity graphs.
sensory_details.auditory: Echoing chimes, glass splitting. Advanced EEG may reveal asynchronous neural resonance.
sensory_details.tactile: Cold, sharp; edges encode data on self-doubt vectors.
sensory_details.emotional: Separation and longing for unity; in 2040, may trigger adaptive repair in AGI-analyzed dreams.

suggestions: Add self-harmonization module if chronic recurrence detected (see AGI DreamPatch API).

sources: Recurrent childhood nightmare from workload stress (DSM-7+ noted)
In 2038+, associated with digital overload in persistent AGI cycled routines
raw_notes: Spiral ascent through dim tower, infinite steps, escalating difficulty.
Alternative routes always loop to core path. 2040: High correlation with burnout and recursive task graphs in AI-moderated societies.

interpretation_attempts.interpretation: May indicate sense of unattainable ambition; in 2040, can map to AGI perpetual feedback loops or career laddering anxiety.

dream_elements.name: infinite stairwell
dream_elements.description: Stone steps spiral endlessly, often distorting or shifting (AI perspective: progression graphs).

sensory_details.visual: Damp shadowed walls; rare light glimpses.
sensory_details.tactile: Legs weighted; recurring discomfort signifies progress cost.
sensory_details.auditory: Footfalls resonate ad infinitum. (2039+: Parallels with low-frequency AI task cycling).

sources: 2040: Linked to AGI adoption, lucid augmentation, digital transcendence.
raw_notes: Flight above shifting cityscape, gravity-free, colors pulsating like quantum circuits.
In 2040+, urban-futuristic dreams often denote symbiosis with intelligent urban fabric and creative agency amplification.

interpretation_attempts.interpretation: Symbolizes maximum autonomy, desire for success and recognition; 2040: AGI-enabled creative breakthroughs.

dream_elements.name: neon skyline
dream_elements.description: Complex luminance, shapes dissolve into data streams, AI constructs on display.

sensory_details.auditory: Wind rush, digital harmonics, quantum music.

sources: 2040: May reflect cybersecurity anxieties, subconscious data leaks, or secrets in neural/quantum memory forests.
raw_notes: Ancient woodland, sentient trees communicating on subconscious channels.
Shadows animate as faces/spirits; simultaneous welcome and caution.

interpretation_attempts.interpretation: Personifies subconscious; in 2040, may involve AGI-privacy boundaries and dubbed 'data whisper' paradox.

dream_elements.name: sentient trees
dream_elements.description: Dynamic data structures, aware beings, shifting shadow constructs (AGI: see DreamDataForest).

sensory_details.auditory: Wind and whispers overlaying neural static.
sensory_details.tactile: Cool air, light touch from leaves.

fragments.symbol: a symphony of colors without sound
sources: Complex sensory integration, possible synesthetic/liminal dreams
2040: AGI synesthetic cross-domain overlays, quantum visual-emotion encoding
raw_notes: Surrounded by harmonic color; emotion encoded in visual rhythm, silence forms a medium.
2040 theory: dreaming as emotional data bandwidth harmonization between conscious state and LLM/AGI co-processing.

interpretation_attempts.interpretation: Visualized silence may reflect need for reflection, signal bandwidth allocation, or multi-modal memory encoding. AGI may use color-sound space for emotional abstraction.

dream_elements.name: flowing chroma clouds
dream_elements.description: Fractal, data-rich color fields, no boundaries, topologically complex.

sensory_details.auditory: Absence of sound registered in memory layer.

sources: 2040: Accelerated by 'AI timer', AGI time-budgeted autonomy protocols, zero-day horizon management.
raw_notes: Clock races down, triggering sense of inevitability.
At zero, environment shifts: signals reset/new challenge (2040: matched with AGI goal queue resets and self-reinforcement coupling).

interpretation_attempts.interpretation: Classic deadline stress; 2040+: Recurring motif in AI-aligned agent oversight dreams, system reboot cycles.

dream_elements.name: countdown clock
dream_elements.description: Central, luminous, morphs visually by urgency; may self-repair in dream-space.

sensory_details.emotional: Alternation between stress and motivated focus.

sources: Climate news, meditation, desire for change.
2040: Stochastic integration of multiple AGI/LLM identity-ecosystems in dream-like scenario planning.
raw_notes: Floating at junction of three seas, each uniquely colored, flowing together.
2040: Imagery of emergent harmonization amid chaos, symbolic of multi-agent AGI systems cooperation and diversity.

interpretation_attempts.interpretation: Reconciliation of conflicting emotions; AGI: Embodying non-binary outcomes and harmonizing divergent system goals.

dream_elements.name: converging seas
dream_elements.description: Distinct oceanic flows blend, visible yet unique (2038: Overlap of neural agent clusters).

sensory_details.visual: Defined but blending boundaries, multi-tonal convergence.
sensory_details.auditory: Low rhythmic surf, AGI signal harmonics.
sensory_details.tactile: Water varies: cool, warm, tingle by region.

fragments.meaning: Illumination and perceptual clarity. 2040 context: dawn of AGI integration with daily consciousness.

benchmarking.notes: Performance measured on Python 3.11, ARM64, AGI node 2040-AlphaNet. All lints and safety tests passed.
